arlut.csd.JDialog
Class StandardDialog

                      arlut.csd.JDialog.StandardDialog
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.RootPaneContainer, javax.swing.WindowConstants
Direct Known Subclasses:
consoleShutdownDialog, createObjectDialog, JDefaultOwnerDialog, messageDialog, openObjectDialog, PersonaDialog, SaveObjDialog, StringDialog
public class StandardDialog
extends javax.swing.JDialog

A dialog base class for centered, possibly modal dialogs. On the Mac, document-modal StandardDialogs will appear as sheets.

Author:
Jonathan Abbey
See Also:
Serialized Form

Nested Class Summary
static class StandardDialog.ModalityType
          Enum that we're using to allow subclasses to tell us what type of modality, if any, they want to use.
